response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in considering this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
